channel.title: Next.js Blog Platform
channel.description: A high-performance blog platform built with Next.js, MDX, and Tailwind CSS.

item.title: Dynamic Routing in Next.js
item.description: Next.js supports dynamic routes out of the box. You can create pages that support dynamic data by adding brackets to a page filename.

item.title: SEO with Next.js
item.description: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) is crucial for any public-facing website. Next.js makes it easy to add meta tags, open graph tags, and JSON-LD structured data.

item.title: Mastering Tailwind CSS
item.description: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework packed with classes like flex, pt-4, text-center and rotate-90 that can be composed to build any design, directly in your markup.

item.title: The Power of Static Site Generation
item.description: Static Site Generation (SSG) is a powerful technique for building fast and secure websites. In this post, we explore how SSG works and why you should consider using it for your next project.

item.title: Getting Started with Next.js
item.description: Next.js is a React framework for production. It gives you the best developer experience with all the features you need for production: hybrid static & server rendering, TypeScript support, smart bundling, route pre-fetching, and more.
